name: WarOfThePlanets
summary: A Fun First Person Shooter in which you fight the opposing planet
short_description:
Main Idea

War of The Planets is a very popular first person shooter. The game is based around two planets raged in war. 

--------------What Happend----------------

The first planet, Zelzah attacks the second planet, Nampa.They are at war for many, many years, until both planets become low on soldiers. They need you to help them!  Once you join you choose one planet to join and you must stick with them and help them win battle. Join them as battle brews!!

--------------Your Mission------------------

You must pick one planet to join and help them win war. If you don't help either, there is a chance that your planet, earth, may be destroyed or yet worse conqueored. And all humans, alive will be turned to slaves and have to work for the planets.

--------------When & Where----------------

The war between the planets started back in 3403 but now it is 3419 and the game takes place on both worlds and sometimes even earth...
